field.name: summary
field.value: Null exceptions in NJS view processing

field.name: description
field.value:
I have MonoRail setup to send me emails of all exceptions and I have been getting a large amount of emails concerning this issue. The issue does not happen on every request, but rather it happens quite intermittently. Please let me know what I can do to help nail down the problem.
Here are a few example stack traces:
Exception: Error generating JS. Template Document\List.njs Stack Trace: at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.NVelocity.NVelocityViewEngine.GenerateJS(TextWriter output, IRailsEngineContext context, Controller controller, String templateName) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.ViewEngineBase.GenerateJS(IRailsEngineContext context, Controller controller, String templateName) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Services.DefaultViewEngineManager.Process(IRailsEngineContext context, Controller controller, String templateName) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.ControllerLifecycleExecutor.ProcessView() at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.ControllerLifecycleExecutor.ProcessSelectedAction(IDictionary actionArgs) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.ControllerLifecycleExecutor.ProcessSelectedAction() at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.MonoRailHttpHandler.Process(IRailsEngineContext context) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.MonoRailHttpHandler.ProcessRequest(HttpContext context) at System.Web.HttpApplication.CallHandlerExecutionStep.System.Web.HttpApplication.IExecutionStep.Execute() at System.Web.HttpApplication.ExecuteStep(IExecutionStep step, Boolean& completedSynchronously) Exception: Error invoking method on generator. Method invoked [ReplaceHtml] with 2 argument(s) Stack Trace: at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.DynamicDispatchSupport.Dispatch(String method, Object[] args) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Internal.JSGeneratorBase.InternalInvoke(String method, Object[] args) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.NVelocity.JSGeneration.JSGeneratorDuck.Invoke(String method, Object[] args) at NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.Node.ASTMethod.Execute(Object o, IInternalContextAdapter context) at NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.Node.ASTReference.Execute(Object o, IInternalContextAdapter context) at NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.Node.ASTReference.Render(IInternalContextAdapter context, TextWriter writer) at NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.Node.SimpleNode.Render(IInternalContextAdapter context, TextWriter writer) at NVelocity.Template.Merge(IContext context, TextWriter writer) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.NVelocity.NVelocityViewEngine.GenerateJS(TextWriter output, IRailsEngineContext context, Controller controller, String templateName) Exception: Exception has been thrown by the target of an invocation. Stack Trace: at System.RuntimeMethodHandle._InvokeMethodFast(Object target, Object[] arguments, SignatureStruct& sig, MethodAttributes methodAttributes, RuntimeTypeHandle typeOwner) at System.RuntimeMethodHandle.InvokeMethodFast(Object target, Object[] arguments, Signature sig, MethodAttributes methodAttributes, RuntimeTypeHandle typeOwner) at System.Reflection.RuntimeMethodInfo.Invoke(Object obj, BindingFlags invokeAttr, Binder binder, Object[] parameters, CultureInfo culture, Boolean skipVisibilityChecks) at System.Reflection.RuntimeMethodInfo.Invoke(Object obj, BindingFlags invokeAttr, Binder binder, Object[] parameters, CultureInfo culture) at System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke(Object obj, Object[] parameters) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.DynamicDispatchSupport.Dispatch(String method, Object[] args) Exception: Could not process partial Document/_List.vm Stack Trace: at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.PrototypeHelper.JSGenerator.Render(Object renderOptions) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.PrototypeHelper.JSGenerator.ReplaceHtml(String id, Object renderOptions) Exception: Could not render partial Document/_List.vm Stack Trace: at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.NVelocity.NVelocityViewEngine.ProcessPartial(TextWriter output, IRailsEngineContext context, Controller controller, String partialName) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Services.DefaultViewEngineManager.ProcessPartial(TextWriter output, IRailsEngineContext context, Controller controller, String partialName) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.PrototypeHelper.JSGenerator.Render(Object renderOptions) Exception: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. Stack Trace: at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.NVelocity.CustomDirectives.SubSectionDirective.Render(IInternalContextAdapter context, TextWriter writer, INode node) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.NVelocity.NVelocityViewContextAdapter.RenderSection(String sectionName) at Manna.Components.GridComponent.Render() at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.NVelocity.CustomDirectives.AbstractComponentDirective.Render(IInternalContextAdapter context, TextWriter writer, INode node) at NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.Node.ASTDirective.Render(IInternalContextAdapter context, TextWriter writer) at NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.Node.ASTBlock.Render(IInternalContextAdapter context, TextWriter writer) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.NVelocity.NVelocityViewContextAdapter.RenderBody(TextWriter writer) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.NVelocity.NVelocityViewContextAdapter.RenderBody() at Manna.Components.BoxComponent.Render() at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.NVelocity.CustomDirectives.AbstractComponentDirective.Render(IInternalContextAdapter context, TextWriter writer, INode node) at NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.Node.ASTDirective.Render(IInternalContextAdapter context, TextWriter writer) at NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.Node.SimpleNode.Render(IInternalContextAdapter context, TextWriter writer) at NVelocity.Template.Merge(IContext context, TextWriter writer) at Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.NVelocity.NVelocityViewEngine.ProcessPartial(TextWriter output, IRailsEngineContext context, Controller controller, String partialName)
